How To: Get a dark theme instead of the white theme

17
Alastir
Tuesday, August 8th, 2017, 12:48:56 AM
  • Click on your username icon (Profile) in the top right corner,
  • Click Settings
  • Scroll down to find Select skin for theme -- Choose the Dark theme
  • Click save changes.
  • Go to the URL again: forums.elanthia.online to "reload" the skin
